wikipedia_page.main: Josh Bray is an English folk blues singer-songwriter born in Devon, England, and currently living in New Hampshire, United States. His debut album Whisky And Wool will be released on March 7, 2011 on NewTide Records. His track 'The River Song' was featured recently in a TV advert for Jack Wills.

response: Gray was co-producer of the Josh Bray album Whiskey and Wool.
